review: There are other options out there for streaming media to your TV, but I found the Apple TV easy to set up, a breeze to control (especially with an iPhone), and able to stream even the largest of my movie files without skipping or stuttering at all. It offers a ton of subscription services right in the box, and anything it doesn't offer, I can stream from my other devices using AirPlay. Though not a perfect product, the pro's outweigh the cons in my opinion. (note: We own mostly Apple devices in our home, so our experience may be different than someone with out any. Haven't used it to stream from one of our PC notebooks yet)Pros:Easy set upiPhone as a Remote (great for entering in name/passwords for your subscription services)Tiny footprintFast streaming of networked media hosted on external HDGreat quality from subscription services (NHL is AWESOME!)Nice Screen Savers based on photos from your iphoto or photstream, or from Flickr searchesCons:iTunes does not support .avi movies without a work-aroundslight delay when changing song/movie using airplayNo Spotify/Pandora built-in - must stream this from another deviceNetflix layout is not as intuitive/pretty as other devices like the PS3 or some Blu-Ray playersWould be nice if it had a USB input for an External HD
author: Joseph M. Barone

review: I love Apple products, but this one needs work.  It is amazing to use Airplay to be able to mirror my screen on my TV and stream music through the big stereo in my room.  But, this device has some serious technical problems.  It regularly disconnects from the wireless network for no apparent reason.  It also constantly disconnects airplay from my computer and makes me turn airplay on and off through the menu of the AppleTV to get it to work again.  I have been stuck in bed after surgery twice in the last four months.  Each time, I used the Apple TV very regularly to stream music or watch movies.  I would estimate I had a problem about five times a day that required power cycling the Apple TV or turning settings on and off in menus because they randomly stopped working.  This product has a lot of potential if they can get it to be stable.
